parameters.prompt: Create a warm, inviting cover image for a WeChat article about Hawaii local life. The article topic is: {{ $('content-generator').item.json.topic }}. Style: Bright, tropical, friendly, authentic Hawaiian atmosphere. Elements: Ocean, palm trees, local culture, warm sunset colors. Mood: Welcoming, peaceful, local lifestyle. Colors: Ocean blue, sunset orange, tropical green, warm yellow. Size: 1024x1024. No text overlay needed.
